patterns_discovered.description: Implementation uses a relative-positioned parent container with absolute-positioned child for page transitions, enabling smooth overlapping transitions
patterns_discovered.implication: Prevents layout shift during transitions and allows pages to stack appropriately

patterns_discovered.description: TransitionGroup explicitly set to component={null} rather than using default behavior, avoiding unnecessary wrapper element
patterns_discovered.implication: Reduces DOM nesting and provides better control over component rendering in transition context
